comment.body: Why? I used Qt as default for a lot of times, and it wasn't so bad
Please, add more languages on ZeroMedium; because it's a really interesting project and it is a pity that the only language available is English

@Glightstar: thank you, I did not know you could do it.
@Krixano: If you have time, and if you want, can add also Italian language ? If you need help for the translation, I'm avaible. Contact me with [ZeroMail](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/?to=chikan) .

> Ability to search other zites, including:

>    ZeroSites
>    0List
>    ZeroTalk
>    ZeroUp
>   Kiwipedia - Only English Hub, Searching is slow compared to the other ones.
This is very usefull . Thanks!
